edge: Captain Jack Sparrow is played by Johnny Depp in the Pirates of the Caribbean movies.
Captain Barbossa is portrayed by Geoffrey Rush in the Pirates of the Caribbean films.
Orlando Bloom plays the role of Will Turner in the Pirates of the Caribbean series.
Keira Knightley acts as Elizabeth Swann in the Pirates of the Caribbean movies.
Jack Davenport portrays Norrington in the Pirates of the Caribbean films.
Kevin R. McNally depicts Joshamee Gibbs in the Pirates of the Caribbean series.
Anamaria is portrayed by Zoe Saldana in the Pirates of the Caribbean movies.
The character Governor Weatherby Swann is played by Jonathan Pryce in the Pirates of the Caribbean films.
